S.FORM: Don Adams kawas tay 1947, ryax sa tay 27 nqu tay 11, Don Adams, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 2013) Don Adams sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA. Don Adams htgan beh Manhattan,hiya yaba William Yarmy ru yaya Consuelo.hiya ru sswe mlikuy(Richard),suruw lga squilq na psibay, Dick Yarmy lalu nya. qnxan nya Don Adams kekong cyugal nya. raral bes Adelaide Efantis Adams, Dorothy Bracken Adams ru Judy Luciano nya,cyugal bes likong. hiya sswe mlikuy(Richard) squilq na psibay(1932 kawas 2 byacing 14 ryax 1992 kawas 5 byacing 5 ryax).hiya sswe kneril( Gloria Yarmy Burton) qutux patas pincyogan nya. maki pitu laqi nya Carolyn,Christine,Cathy,Cecily,Stacey,Sean ru Beige.hiya kneril laqi (Cecily ) 2004 kawas magal nbu wal mhuqil la.hiya mlikuy laqi (Sean) 2006 kawas magal tunux nbu wal mhuqil la(35 kawas). mhuqil Adams 2005 kawas 9 byacing 25 ryax,maki Angeles,California na Cedars Sinai wal mhuqil la. pincyuwagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing masuq mspung mari sa pspngan mari na maycyugal byacing lga
